ụlọ ọgwụ National Orthopedic Hospital, Igbobi, Lagos (NOHIL), bụ ụlọọgwụ dị na Lagos, Naijiria.

Ụlọ ọgwụ National Orthopedic Hospital, Igbobi, Lagos malitere ọrụ dịka ebe mgbazigharị maka ndị agha merụrụ ahụ n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ na 1943, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ malitere n'ụlọọgwụ n'okpuru nlekọta ahụike British Colonial Medical Services nke Colonial Nigeria na 6 Disemba afọ 1945
ụlọ ọgwụ ahụ, nke akpọrọ aha ya na mbụ Royal Orthopedic Hospital na 1956 bụkwa ihe enyemaka n'ịgwọ ndị agha merụrụ ahụ na ndị nkịtị n'agha obodo Naijiria nke 1967 ruo 1970
E nyefere ụlọ ọgwụ ahụ n'aka gọọmentị Lagos
a 1975 ma mesịakwa Gọọmenti etiti na 1979.
ụlọ ọgwụ ahụ nwere ike ndị ọrụ nke ihe dịka otu puku na narị atọ
O nwere ngalaba nlekọta ahụike yana ikike nke nwere akwa narị anọ na iri ise
A na-ewere ụlọ ọgwụ a ugbu a dị ka ụlọ ọgwụ ọkpụkpụ kachasị na West Afrịka
Mobolaji Bank Anthony kwadoro ngalaba ọhụrụ nke ụlọọgwụ nke gụnyere nrụzigharị ngalaba mberede ahụ
